remarks: Version of ~ spimed with a dv condition, which does not require ~ ax-13 .  (Contributed by BJ, 31-May-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
bj-spimedv.1 $e |- ( ch -> F/ x ph ) $.
bj-spimedv.2 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph -> ps ) ) $.
bj-spimedv $p |- ( ch -> ( ph -> E. x ps ) ) $.
$d x y $.
